import React from 'react' import styles from "./BasicInfo.module.css" const BasicInfo = () => { const handle=()=>{ window.open("https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-Mz6lE_F6N6jjkxDTatPEoTATz8vpsoP/view?usp=sharing") } return (

SARVESH KUMAR SHARMA

FULL STACK DEVELOPER

Munger,WestBengal,India
+91 9113763003
sssarvesh1999@gmail.com
) } export default BasicInfo;
